snippet: The Sundance Film Festival has created a growing family of directors whose movies weren’t accepted for a screening there.
abstract: Many directors experience hurt, frustration and fallback strategizing when their movies are not accepted into Sundance Film Festival, nation's pre-eminent independent film festival; some are using their rejections as way to promote their projects elsewhere.
lead_paragraph: The Sundance Film Festival has created a growing family of directors whose movies weren’t accepted for a screening there.

headline.seo: A Talk With Directors Rejected by Sundance Festival
headline.main: Sundance Makes a Family of the Denied
headline.print_headline: Sundance Makes a Family Of the Denied
